channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How (and why) federated learning enhances cybersecurity
item.description: Federated learning’s popularity is rapidly increasing because it addresses common development-related security concerns.

item.title: ‘She did not even attend his funeral’: My friend married in secret and suddenly died. Does his widow inherit his $1 million home?
item.description: “His parents paid for the $50,000 down payment to the house when they purchased it 30 years ago.”

item.title: ‘Some airline passengers are gross’: I don’t understand why they cheat to board early. Why do they act like savages?
item.description: American Airlines is targeting “gate lice” with technology that sets off an alarm when a passenger tries to skip their group number.

item.title: DeepMind and Hugging Face release SynthID to watermark LLM-generated text
item.description: SynthID makes subtle changes to LLM-generated text to create a statistical signature while preserving the quality of the output.

item.title: ‘Their house was purchased with my family money’: My late father left a life estate to his second wife. She’s only 10 years older than me. How can I undo this?
item.description: “Apparently the probate laws in Florida are different, perhaps superseding the will.”

item.title: OpenAI CEO responds to report of GPT-5 Orion coming later this year: ‘Fake news out of control’
item.description: It's an interesting quasi-denial given how precise The Verge report is, noting specific details about Orion's supposed release plans.
